attributes.action: Ensure that commercial vehicles, including hire vehciles, that are not 'sign written', display contact details of the owner/operator.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The details should be clear and readable and include company/operator name, contact address and a landline phone number. There is a need to identify drivers/companies of unmarked commercial vehicles.  This might improve the conduct of the few 'bad apples' that give the professional drivers a bad reputation
